Purpose: To diagnose and manage hemolytic anemia by interpreting CBC, reticulocyte count, peripheral smear, bilirubin, LDH, haptoglobin, and DAT results.
Container: EDTA tube for whole blood; serum separator (SST) or heparinized tube for serum/plasma
Equipment: Automated hematology analyzer (e.g., Sysmex XN-Series), flow cytometer/reticulocyte counter, biochemistry analyzer, microscope, centrifuge
